name: Picarto - Dark / Transparent Style
description:
A theme that makes everything darker and a bit transparent on Picarto.tv...
I didn't work a lot on it, so there might be some tiny glitches.

Anyway, I hope you'll enjoy it.
The style was tested under chrome, but not firefox.
additional_info:
Current Version: 1.12 Changelog 1.12 • Made some small enhancements to the chat. (Changed the style of the system messages.) 1.11 • Now the
style should work. Made a small typo, sorry. 1.1 • The style does won't affect the dashboard anymore. I'll make a separate style for it. • Edited the
style to make it look nicer. • Added colors to labels (Tools, Software, Community, Tags...) • Made other tweaks. 1.0 • Inital Release... Known issues: No issues...
